guys i remember you need usbloader gx for using on wii put it on your root in SD card then go to homebrew and do the thing to install it and you need to use wbfs manager you can see a totoriail on how to do that and then plug in your usb to your wii and open up usb loader gx but only for the first time click on the game go to setting and the one thats really up in the setting then DOL and change it and try to put it into player.dol and then run it and it will show wii motion tut and then will exit to wii menu then open setting as press reset defualt and play the game
